documentation.description: Returns results matching a query expressed in Event Query Language (EQL)

index.description: The name of the index to scope the operation

wait_for_completion_timeout.description: Specify the time that the request should block waiting for the final response

keep_on_completion.description: Control whether the response should be stored in the cluster if it completed within the provided [wait_for_completion] time (default: false)

keep_alive.description: Update the time interval in which the results (partial or final) for this search will be available

body.description: Eql request body. Use the `query` to limit the query scope.
